text: Q60.| How many of following statement is/are correct? S1: To convert a decimal integer to base 4 form, repeated multiplication by 4 is used. S2: In the Gray code sequence, two consecutive code values differ by one bit. (a) only s1 (b) only s2 (c) both s1 & s2 (d) none of them Answer :( b) Solution : To convert decimal integer to base 4 S1: Repeated division by 4 is used not multiplication. False S2: true property of gray code .. only S2 is correct
